actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department; Labor Department.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to limit eligibility for unemployment compensation for ex-servicemembers, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that an ex-servicemember shall be eligible for unemployment compensation with respect to his or her military service only if: (1) such individual was discharged or released under honorable conditions; and (2) such discharge or release was a direct result of a service-incurred injury, a reduction in the authorized strength of the individual's unit, or a demobilization of the unit.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to limit eligibility for unemployment compensation for ex-servicemembers, and for other purposes.
